channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Wizz Air proposes 300% bonus for its CEO following a ‘parade of black swans’
item.description: Jozsef Váradi's pay is a third of what it was in 2019 as the airline battles several crises.

item.title: Chinese stocks extend gains after Beijing’s stimulus bazooka
2,000 workers at Hawaii’s biggest hotel go on strike
item.description: More than 10,000 hotels workers across the U.S. went on strike on Labor Day weekend, with most ending after two or three days.

item.title: OECD forecasts U.S. economy to slow down next year
American company says Mexico president expropriated its $1.9 billion crocodile-filled quarries on the Caribbean coast
item.description: U.S. quarry company said the Mexican government carried out a de facto expropriation of its properties on Mexico’s Caribbean coast.

item.title: China stock-market jump may be ‘tradable rally’ — but approach with caution
U.S. will now let Mexico inspect its own export avocados for pests and California growers aren’t happy
item.description: Inspectors hired by the U.S. Department of Agriculture have been threatened in Mexico for refusing to certify deceptive shipments in recent years.

item.title: Stock-market indicator with a near-perfect track record is flashing a ‘buy’ sign
Kamala Harris says she will support crypto: Here are 3 steps that would show she’s serious
item.description: A law professor and digital money expert explains what it will take to persuade a skeptical crypto community that she offers a new path.

item.title: How Caroline Ellison almost avoided prison in the criminal collapse of FTX
